model.level

Class LevelImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.level.LevelImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Level

    public class LevelImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Level
    This class represent the Model, as it contains all game elements.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LevelImpl()
      The constructor is used to set the size of the map, because it's the first thing to do to start the game.
